sentence.Network_cn: 她伪善地批评着每一个人.

list.abs: a sickening sanctimonious smile ., 令人作呕的伪装神圣的笑容.
uncelestial worldly carnal corporal secular humane假神圣 sanctimonious sanctified过分注重细节的、挑剔的、拘于礼节的 meticulous nitpick finicky.
You do not have to be so sanctimonious to prove that you are devout ., 您不必如此伪善 , 证明你是虔诚的.
Please , spare me any sanctimonious injunctions about her chosen way of life ., 请 , 饶了我对她选择的生活方式任何冠冕堂皇的禁令.

auth_sentence.content: Could you then sanctimoniously dissect this kind of torture, discussing in abstract terms those 'obedient agents in a hierarchy'?
